actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to require the establishment of standards related to rear-mounted lighting systems.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Transportation to establish standards for motor vehicles with rear-mounted lighting systems. Provides for equipping such vehicles with various colored lights to indicate: (1) forward motion with and without power from the vehicle's engine; (2) turning; and (3) braking.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to require the establishment of standards related to rear-mounted lighting systems.
